languages.text: {n}Молодой человек явно прилагает немало усилий, чтобы выглядеть опрятно — его одежда почти новая и щегольская, волосы уложены. Картину портят плохо оттертые пятна масла из подтекающего {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланта{/g}, и размер нарядного камзола — он явно с чужого плеча. Он широко улыбается и произносит звонким голосом:{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Ваша Светлость{/d}, какая невероятная честь! Вас, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, покорител{mf|я|ьницу} звезд, конечно же, не сможет удивить эта скромная коллекция. Но она — лучшая на Футфоле!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Молодой человек явно прилагает немало усилий, чтобы выглядеть опрятно — его одежда почти новая и щегольская, волосы уложены. Картину портят плохо оттертые пятна масла из подтекающего импланта, и размер нарядного комзола — он явно с чужого плеча. Он широко улыбается и произносит звонким голосом:{/n} "Ваше благородие, какая невероятная честь! Вас, Вольного Торговца, покорител{mf|я|ьницу} звезд, конечно же, не сможет удивить эта скромная коллекция. Но она — лучшая на Футфоле!"

languages.text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else. He gives you a beaming smile and says, his voice ringing,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, what an incredible honour! This humble collection is hardly likely to impress you, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, conqueror of stars. But it is the best one on Footfall!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой человек явно прилагает немало усилий, чтобы выглядеть опрятно — его одежда почти новая и щегольская, волосы уложены. Картину портят плохо оттертые пятна масла из подтекающего {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланта{/g}, и размер нарядного камзола — он явно с чужого плеча. Он широко улыбается и произносит звонким голосом:{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Ваша Светлость{/d}, какая невероятная честь! Вас, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, покорител{mf|я|ьницу} звезд, конечно же, не сможет удивить эта скромная коллекция. Но она — лучшая на Футфоле!"

traits.locale_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look presentable — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well-groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed off oil stains from his leaky implant and the size of the doublet — it was made for someone else. He gives you a beaming smile and says, his voice ringing,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, what an incredible honor! This humble collection can hardly impress you, a Rogue Trader, conqueror of stars. But it is the best one on Footfall!"

languages.text: {n}青年は格好よく見せるためにあらゆる面で努力しているのが見て取れる。洒落た服は新品同様で、髪も手入れされている。しかし、その印象も雑に拭かれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}の油漏れと、明らかに他人のために作られただぼだぼのジャケットのせいで台無しだ。彼は満面の笑顔をこちらに向けて、明るく話しかけてきた。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}陛下{/d}、なんと光栄なことでしょう！星々の支配者である{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はこんなささやかなコレクションでは驚きもしないでしょうが、それでもフットフォールで最高のものばかり揃っています！」
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else. He gives you a beaming smile and says, his voice ringing,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, what an incredible honour! This humble collection is hardly likely to impress you, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, conqueror of stars. But it is the best one on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}青年は格好よく見せるためにあらゆる面で努力しているのが見て取れる。洒落た服は新品同様で、髪も手入れされている。しかし、その印象も雑に拭かれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}の油漏れと、明らかに他人のために作られただぼだぼのジャケットのせいで台無しだ。彼は満面の笑顔をこちらに向けて、明るく話しかけてきた。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}陛下{/d}、なんと光栄なことでしょう！星々の支配者である{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はこんなささやかなコレクションでは驚きもしないでしょうが、それでもフットフォールで最高のものばかり揃っています！」

languages.text: {n}很显然，这个年轻人尽其所能，让自己看起来是个正派人。他时髦的衣服几乎是全新的，头发也修剪得很整齐。不过，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}侧漏出的油渍清洗得相当不干净，夹克看起来也很不合身，尺寸显然是为其他人量身定做的。这些细节破坏了他体面的形象。年轻人对你露出了灿烂的笑容，以洪亮的嗓音开了口。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}大人{/d}，你来了，这真是难以置信的荣誉！你是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，群星的征服者。尽管我这些不起眼的藏品可能无法给你留下深刻印象，但这些东西是落脚港最好的货物！”
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else. He gives you a beaming smile and says, his voice ringing,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, what an incredible honour! This humble collection is hardly likely to impress you, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, conqueror of stars. But it is the best one on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，这个年轻人尽其所能，让自己看起来是个正派人。他时髦的衣服几乎是全新的，头发也修剪得很整齐。不过，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}侧漏出的油渍清洗得相当不干净，紧身衣看起来也很不合身，尺寸显然是为其他人量身定做的。这些细节破坏了他体面的形象。年轻人对你露出了灿烂的笑容，以洪亮的嗓音开了口。{/n}“大人，你来了，这真是难以置信的荣誉！你是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，群星的征服者。尽管我这些不起眼的藏品可能无法给你留下深刻印象，但这些东西是落脚港最好的货物！”

languages.text: {n}Salta a la vista que el joven se esmera por dar buena imagen. Su ropa nueva sigue las tendencias y lleva un peinado muy conseguido. Dicha impresión queda arruinada por las manchas de aceite de su {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} agujereado y el talle de la chaqueta, que claramente fue elaborado con otra persona en mente. Te dedica una sonrisa radiante y dice con voz sonora:{/n} «{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|Milord|Milady}{/d}, ¡qué gran honor! Dudo que esta humilde colección impresione a {mf|un|una} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y {mf|conquistador|conquistadora} de estrellas de su talla, pero ¡es la mejor de todo Paso!».
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else. He gives you a beaming smile and says, his voice ringing,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, what an incredible honour! This humble collection is hardly likely to impress you, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, conqueror of stars. But it is the best one on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Salta a la vista que el joven se esmera por dar buena imagen. Su ropa nueva sigue las tendencias y lleva un peinado muy conseguido. Dicha impresión queda arruinada por las manchas de aceite de su {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} agujereado y el talle del jubón, que claramente fue elaborado con otra persona en mente. Te dedica una sonrisa radiante y dice con voz sonora:{/n} «¡{mf|Milord|Milady, ¡qué gran honor! Dudo que esta humilde colección impresione a {mf|un|una} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y {mf|conquistador|conquistadora} de estrellas de su talla, pero ¡es la mejor de todo Paso!».

languages.text: {n}Le jeune homme a manifestement fait des efforts pour paraître élégant : ses vêtements à la mode sont presque neufs et ses cheveux, méticuleusement coiffés. Cependant, cette apparence soignée est démentie par des taches d'huile mal nettoyées provenant de son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} et par la coupe douteuse de sa veste, manifestement confectionnée pour quelqu'un d'autre. Avec un grand sourire plein d'assurance, il vous lance :{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Votre Seigneurie{/d}, c'est un honneur de vous accueillir ! Mon humble ménagerie ne sera peut-être pas de taille à impressionner {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} qui conquiert les étoiles, mais c'est tout de même la plus grande de Castel ! »
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else. He gives you a beaming smile and says, his voice ringing,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, what an incredible honour! This humble collection is hardly likely to impress you, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, conqueror of stars. But it is the best one on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune homme a manifestement fait des efforts pour paraître élégant : ses vêtements à la mode sont presque neufs et ses cheveux, méticuleusement coiffés. Cependant, cette apparence soignée est démentie par des taches d'huile mal nettoyées provenant de son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} et par la coupe douteuse de son pourpoint, manifestement confectionné pour quelqu'un d'autre. Avec un grand sourire plein d'assurance, il vous lance :{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, c'est un honneur de vous accueillir ! Mon humble ménagerie ne sera peut-être pas de taille à impressionner {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} qui conquiert les étoiles, mais c'est tout de même la plus grande de Castel ! »

languages.text: {n}Dieser junge Mann gibt sich offensichtlich große Mühe, adrett auszusehen – seine modische Kleidung ist praktisch neu, und seine Haare sind sehr gepflegt. Getrübt wird dieser Eindruck durch die unzureichend entfernten Ölflecken von seinem leckenden {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g} und der Passform der Jacke, die eindeutig für jemand anderen angefertigt wurde. Er lächelt dich strahlend an und sagt mit klangvoller Stimme:{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}{/d}, was für eine unglaubliche Ehre! Diese bescheidene Sammlung dürfte Euch kaum beeindrucken, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|einen Freihändler, der|eine Freihändlerin, die}{/g} die Sterne erobert. Aber es ist die beste auf Footfall!"
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else. He gives you a beaming smile and says, his voice ringing,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, what an incredible honour! This humble collection is hardly likely to impress you, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, conqueror of stars. But it is the best one on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dieser junge Mann gibt sich offensichtlich große Mühe, adrett auszusehen – seine modische Kleidung ist praktisch neu, und seine Haare sind sehr gepflegt. Getrübt wird dieser Eindruck durch die unzureichend entfernten Ölflecken von seinem leckenden {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g} und der Passform des Wamses, das eindeutig für jemand anderen angefertigt wurde. Er lächelt dich strahlend an und sagt mit klangvoller Stimme:{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, was für eine unglaubliche Ehre! Diese bescheidene Sammlung dürfte Euch kaum beeindrucken, {mf|einen Freihändler, der|eine Freihändlerin, die} die Sterne erobert. Aber es ist die beste auf Footfall!"

{n}Dieser junge Mann gibt sich offensichtlich große Mühe, adrett auszusehen – seine modische Kleidung ist praktisch neu, und seine Haare sind sehr gepflegt. Getrübt wird dieser Eindruck durch die unzureichend entfernten Ölflecken von seinem leckenden {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g} und der Passform der Jacke, die eindeutig für jemand anderen angefertigt wurde. Er lächelt dich strahlend an und sagt mit klangvoller Stimme:{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, was für eine unglaubliche Ehre! Diese bescheidene Sammlung dürfte Euch kaum beeindrucken, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|einen Freihändler, der|eine Freihändlerin, die}{/g} die Sterne erobert. Aber es ist die beste auf Footfall!"

languages.text: {n}Bu genç adam belli ki janti görünmek için elinden geleni yapmış. Son moda kıyafetleri epey yeni sayılır, saçı da gayet düzgün taranmış. Yaratmaya çalıştığı izlenimi bozan şey ise yağ akıtan {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantından{/g} kaynaklı, gelişigüzel silinmiş lekeler ve üzerine oturmayan, başka birisi için dikildiği belli olan ceketi. Sana kocaman gülümsüyor ve çınlayan sesiyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri{/d}, ne büyük bir onur! Bu mütevazı koleksiyon sizin gibi bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'i{/g}, yıldızların fatihini etkilemeyi başaramayacaktır ama yine de Binliman'da daha iyisini bulamazsınız!"
languages.original_text: {n}This young man is clearly making every effort to look dapper — his fashionable clothes are practically new and his hair is well groomed. What ruins this impression is the poorly scrubbed-off oil stains from his leaky {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} and the fit of the jacket, which was clearly made for someone else. He gives you a beaming smile and says, his voice ringing,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, what an incredible honour! This humble collection is hardly likely to impress you, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, conqueror of stars. But it is the best one on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu genç adam belli ki alımlı görünmek için elinden geleni yapıyor; son moda kıyafetleri oldukça yeni sayılır ve saçı gayet düzgün taranmış. Yaratmaya çalıştığı izlenimi bozan şey ise yağ akıtan {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}ından kaynaklı, gelişigüzel silinmiş lekeler ve üzerine oturmayan, başka birisi için dikildiği belli olan ceketi. Sana kocaman gülümsüyor ve melodik sesiyle konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu ne büyük bir onur! Bu mütevazı koleksiyon sizin gibi bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'i, yıldızların fatihini etkilemeyi başaramayacaktır ama yine de Binliman'da daha iyisini bulamazsınız!"
